name: Harvester (itch) (CaptainCronch)
description:
Use Fullscreen and scroll the mouse before starting!

Harvester

Made for Godot Wild Jam #43

By:

Yours truly - programming

Jiro - sound & music

Sindre Skaraas - art

Controls:

WASD/Arrow keys - movement

Space/Z/Enter/Click - harvest/till/plant

1/2/3/Mouse scroll - change mode

E - it's a secret
